channel.title: Portapps
channel.description: Collection of portable apps for Windows

item.title: DBeaver portable 25.3.2-51
item.description:

item.title: Skype portable abandoned
item.description: As of May 5th, 2025, Skype is retired. This means that the Skype portable app is now also abandoned and will no longer receive updates.

item.title: Portapps 3.17.0
item.description:
• Go 1.25 (#416)
  • Bump github.com/go-viper/mapstructure/v2 from 2.2.1 to 2.4.0 in (#401 #406)
  • Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.10.0 to 1.11.1 in (#413)
  • Bump golang.org/x/sys from 0.32.0 to 0.36.0 in (#398 #415)
